name: Play & Win
description: '''Play & Win''' is a Romanian songwriting and [[music producer|music production]] project that was formed as a trio in 2008 by Radu Bolfea, Marcel Botezan and Sebastian Barac. It became a solo project by Bolfea after Botezan and Barac left and formed '''Marco & Seba''' in 2013. The production team have more than 500 songs to their credit registered at the [[PRS for Music|PRS]].{{fact|date=April 2015}} As Play & Win, they have been produced some of Romania's biggest dance music hits, collaborating with artists including [[Inna]], [[Akcent]], [[3rei Sud Est]], and Cătălin Josan. As a musical group, they have released numerous singles that have charted on various music charts. They are among the pioneers of the Romanian [[Popcorn (Romanian music style)|popcorn]] music style.
